src: Wa adhafa qa2ilan:"ladayna al-2an fe2ran fi 3omor al-arba3 ashhor ghayr mousabin bi da2 as-soukari, ba3da an kanou mousabin bihi min qabel".
mt: And the pilot said: "We had a problem with the engine four hours ago, but it was not serious."
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: 7adhara al-doktor Ehud Ur, ustadh attib bi jami3at Dalhousie fi Halifaks fi Nova Skotia wa ra2is al qisim assariri wal3ilmi fi jam3iyat assuraki alkanadiya, min anna al-ba7eth la yazalu fi ayamihi al-2ula.
mt: 7adhara al-doktor Ehud Ur, ustadh attib bi jami3at Dalhousie fi Halifaks fi Nova Skotia wa ra2is al qisim assariri wal3ilmi fi jam3iyat assuraki alkanadiya, min anna al-ba7eth la yazalu fi ayamihi al-2ula.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Wa yushakkek al-doktor Ehud Ur, mithil ba3edh al-5ubara2 al-a5arin, fi imkaniyat ashifa2 min marad as-soukari, mushiran ila anna hadhihi annata2ij laysa laha silaton bil ashkhas al-musabin bi marad as-soukari min an-naw3i al-awwal.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, like many other patients, is in remission from cancer, and is confident that this year's treatment will be without side effects for patients with early-stage cancer.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Fi yawm al-ethnayn, sarra7at assekretera adda2ima fi lajnat Nobel lil adab fi al- Akadimiyya Assuwaydiya, assayida Sara Danyus, khilal barnamajen idha3iyyen 3ala radyo Sveriges fi Assuwayed, anna al-lajna qad takhalat 3an badhel juhudiha fi al-wusul ila Bob Dylan ba3da fashaliha fi attaswul ma3ahou bi sha2en fawzihi bi ja2izat Nobel  fi al-abad li 3am 2016.
mt: On Monday, the secretary of the Swedish Academy, Sara Danius, in a radio interview with Sveriges Radio in Stockholm, said the committee had decided to end its search for Bob Dylan after his Nobel Prize acceptance speech was deemed insufficient.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Qalat assayida Sara Danyous: "na7nu 7aliyyan la naf3alu shay2an. Laqad ajraytu 3iddat ittisalat ma3a shuraka2ihi al muqarrabin wa arsaltu lahom barid elektroni wa stajabu bi shakel widdiy lil 8aya. Wa hadha bil ta2kid kafen fil-waqet al-7ali".
mt: Said Sara Danyous: "We are very happy. I have sent a fax to my partners and sent them an electronic mail and received a positive response. And this is in the right time."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Wa fi waqten sabeq ashara assayed Jamie Siminoff, arra2is atanfizi li sharikat Ring, ila anna asharika intalakt 3endma la7adha anna jaras babihi ghayr masmu3 min matjarihi fi mir2ab manzilihi.
mt: 10 years ago, Jamie Siminoff, the CEO of Ring, told his investors that his company had sold zero doorbells in his neighborhood.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Wa qala innahu sana3a jarasan mutasel bil Wi-Fi.
mt: And he said it was a wireless signal.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Wa qala assayed Siminoff inna nisbat al-mabi3at qad zdadat ba3da dhuhurihi fi 7alaka li barnamej Shark Tank fi 3am 2013 haythu rafada al-fariq tamwil asharika annashi2a.
mt: Siminoff said the company's sales have increased since its appearance on the TV show Shark Tank in 2013, when the panel of investors rejected his pitch for a company share.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Fi awakher 3am 2017, dhahara Siminoff fi barnamej tasawwuq telefizyoni 3ala qanat QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on a QVC infomercial.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Wa qamat sharikat Ring bi taswiyaten qada2iyya ma3a sharikat il-amen al-munafisa  ADT.
mt: Ring Airways has filed a formal complaint with the Civil Aviation Authority.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Bi-raghem min woujoud leqa7en qadiren 3ala al-7ad min wafiyyat marad al-Ebola, illa anna 7atta l2an, lam yatem ithbat ay 3aqarir munasiba li 3ilaj al-3adwah al-mawjoudah.
mt: In the absence of a vaccine, there is no proven treatment for Ebola.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Adhara a7adu koktel al-ajsam al-mudhadda ZMapp nata2ija wa3idatan fi hadha al-majal, laken asharat addirast arrasmiyya ila annahu aqal fa2idatan mimma huwa matlub fi taqlil 7alat al-wafat.
mt: The ZMapp cocktail has been in short supply, but the FDA has approved its use in the U.S. in an emergency.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Fi tajribat PALM , kana ZMapp bimathabat 3unsur ta7akum mimaa ya3ni anna al-3ulama2 qad estakhdamuh ka 5atten asasiy wa qaranuhu bil 3ilajat althalathati al-2u5ra.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning that the researchers used it as a placebo and compared it to the three standard treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Yad3amu iti7ad al-Wilayat al-Muta7ida lil-jumbaz risalat al-lajna al-olambiyya w tuwafiqu 3ala 7ajat al-3a2ila al-olombiyya al-mutlaqa ila ta3ziz bi2a amina li-jami3 ar-riyadiyyin.
mt: The United States Olympic Committee will send a letter to the IOC to protest the USOC's lifetime ban on the Russian Olympic Committee.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Natafiqu ma3a bayan al-lajna al-olombiyya al-amrikiyya (USOC) 3ala annahu yumkinu da3em masale7 ar-riyadiyin wal-andiya wa riyadatihim bi-shaklen afdal, min 5ilal al-mudiy quduman na7wa taghyirin dhi maghza dakhil al-muzama, badalan min sa7b ashahadat.
mt: We are in agreement with the USOC that the athletes and their coaches can be better served by a change in the format of the competition, rather than a change in the venue.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Yad3amu iti7ad al-wilayat al-muta7ida lil-jumbaz al-qiyam bi-ta7qiqin mustakillin qad yusallit ad-daw2 3ala kayfa anna sou2 istighlal al-nisab min kibal al-najiyat min i3tida2 Larry Nassar qad la yatimu iktishafuhu li mudda tawila wa tashmul ay taghayurat daruriyya wa munasiba.
mt: The states involved in the gymnastics abuse investigation will continue to press for answers on how the FBI missed the opportunity to arrest Larry Nassar for a long time and what changes are necessary and appropriate.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Yatabanna iti7ad al-wilayat al-muta7ida lil-jumbaz wa (USOC) nafs al-hadaf wa huwa ja3el riyadat al-jumbaz wa sa2er al-riyadat aminatan qader al-imkan li-tamkin al-riyadiyin min mutaba3at a7lamihim fi bi2aten ijiabiyya w amina.
mt: The USOC will be hosting the Olympic and Paralympic athletes at the Olympic Training Center, which is fully equipped to accommodate the athletes' needs.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Tawal al-sitiyniyat min al-qaren al-madi, 3amila Brzezinski lada Jon Kennedy ka-mustashar lil 2amen al-qawmi (NSA) thumma fi idarat Lyndon Jonson.
mt: She was born in Poland, worked for Brzezinski as a translator for the National Security Agency, then in the Lyndon Johnson administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: 5ilal ikhtiyarat 3am 1976, 3amila ka mustashar li Carter bisha2en al-siyasat al-kharijiya, thuma 3amila ka mustashar lil 2amen al-qawmii (NSA) min 3am 1977 7atta 3am 1981,5alafan li Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, he served as a foreign policy adviser to Carter, then as a national security adviser from 1977 to 1981, replacing Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Wa bi-sifatihi mustasharan li amen al-qawmi, fa qad sa3ad Brzezinski al-sayed Carter fi al-ta3amol al-diblomasy ma3 al-shu2oun al-3alamiya, mithil intifaqiyat Camp David 3am 1978, wa tatbi3 al-3alakat al-amrikiya w siniya, wa thawra al-iraniyya al-lati addat ila azmat ar-raha2en al-iraniya 3am 1979, wal-ghazuw al-sovyeti li Afghanistan 3am 1979.
mt: And in his capacity as a private citizen, Brzezinski had advised Carter on foreign policy matters, such as the Camp David Accords of 1978, the normalization of U.S.-China relations, and the Iranian Revolution that led to the Iranian hostage crisis of 1979, and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: 7asala al-film, al-ladhi jama3 bayna Ryan Gosling wa Emma Stone, 3ala tarshi7at fi jami3 al-fi2at ar-ra2isiyya.
mt: The film, which stars Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, opened in the top spot.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: 7asala Gosling wa Stone 3ala tarshi7at li afdal mumathil wa mumathila.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for best actor and actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: tashmul al-tarshi7at al-u5ra afdal sura, wa afdal  mu5rej, wa afdal taswir sinama2i, wa afdal tasmim azya2, wa afdal ta7rir aflam, wa afdal musika taswiriya,bil idafa ila  afdal tasmim intaj, wa afdal ta7rir lil sawet, wa afdal ta3dilat sawtiyya, wa afdal sinario asliy.
mt: The best film, the best director, the best cinematographer, the best screenplay, the best film editing, the best film score, the best production design, the best sound editing, the best sound mixing, the best original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Talaqat ughniyatan min film La la land, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) wa City of Stars, tarshi7at li afdal aghani asliya. Wa talaqa studyo Lionsgate 26 tarshy7an- akthar min 2ay studyo a5ar.
mt: 2 songs from La La Land, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, won best original song. Lionsgate won 26 awards, more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Fi  waqt muta2a5ir yawm al-a7ad, a3lana ar-ra2is al-ameriki Donald Trump, fi bayan alqah 3abra al-sikritir al-sa7afi, anna al-quwwat al-amrikiyya satughader Surya.
mt: In a dramatic day, U.S. President Donald Trump, in a statement to the secret service, said the American forces would attack Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Ja2a hadha al-i3lan ba3da an ajra Trump hadithan hatifiyyan ma3 ar-ra2is al-turki Rajab Tayyib Erdogan.
mt: This announcement came after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Kama sa-tatawalla 7irasat muqatili tanzim da3esh al-2asra al-ladhin rafadet al-duwal al-urabiyya bi7asab al bayan i3adatihim.
mt: As the group's spokesman said in a statement.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Wa hadha la yu2akked fakat anna 3ala al-aqal ba3ed al-daynasurat ladayha rish, wa hadhihi nazariyya muntashira sabiqan, laken la yumken tawfir tafasil mithil al-lawn wa tartib al-thulathy al-ab3ad.
mt: This is not to say that the theory is wrong, but that it is incomplete, and that the details of the mechanism and the order of the events are still unknown.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Yaqulu al-3ulama2 inna lawn rish hadha al-7ayawam bunni kastana2iy min al-a3la ma3 janib sufli sha7ib aw karutini.
mt: The researchers say the new material is a form of cast iron with a higher carbon content than normal steel.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Yamna7u al-iktishaf aydan nazratan thaqibatan li-tatawur al-rish lida al-tuyur.
mt: The discovery also suggests that the growth of feathers may have evolved independently in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Nazarn li 3adam i7tiwa2 rish al-diynasurat 3ala 3amud fiqari mutatawir, yusmma "rachis", wa lakin ladayh mizat ukhra- al 2aslat wal-2asila - istantaja al-bahithun anna al-3amud qad tatawara tadrijiyan la7iqan li hadhihi al-mizat al-u5ra.
mt: 3amud fiqari mutatawir, yusmma "rachis", wa lakin ladayh mizat ukhra- al 2aslat wal-2asila - istantaja al-bahithun anna al-3amud qad tatawara tadrijiyan la7iqan li hadhihi al-mizat al-u5ra.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Yushiru haykal al-rish ila annahu lam yatim isti5damuhu athna2a at-tayaran bal li tanzim darajat al-7arara aw 3ardiha. wa qtara7a al-ba7ithun anna 3ala raghem min anna hadha huwa dhayl daynasur saghir, illa anna al-2ayinat tuzhir rishan balighan wa laysa rish for5 saghir.
mt: The building's roof was designed to withstand the weight of an aircraft or its landing gear. The lead researcher said this was not a small error, but that the images showed a full-grown man's head, not a child's.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Wa qtara7a al-ba7ithun anna 3ala raghem min anna hadha huwa dhayl daynasur saghir, illa anna al-2ayinat tuzhir rishan balighan wa laysa rish for5 saghir.
mt: The lead researcher said that this is not a small step, but that the images show adult cells, not immature cells.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Nfajarat sayaratun mufakhakhatun fi maqar ashurta fi madinat Ghazi 3antab aturkiya saba7a ams, ma asfara 3an maqtal dabiti shurta wa isabat akhtar min 3ishrin akharin.
mt: A police vehicle exploded in the city of Gaziantep, Turkey, on Saturday, killing one officer and injuring at least 19 others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Wa qala maktab al-mu7afiz inna 19 min afrad ashurta kanu min bayn al-musabin.
mt: 19 security personnel were among the dead.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Wa qalat ashurta innaha tashtabih bi-dulu3 tanzim al-dawla Da3esh fi al-hujum.
mt: The army said the group is using improvised explosive devices in its attacks.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Wa ktashafu anna ashames ta3malu wifqa al-mabade2 al-lati ta3malu wifqaha al-nujum: tamma iktishaf anna 7arakat al-nujum madfu3a bi- ida2ataha, wa dawaraniha fa 7aseb.
mt: And it was found that the stars are fixed in their orbits: the sun revolves around its axis, and the stars revolve around it.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Wa tustakhdam al-ida2a wal dawaran ma3an li ta7did raqam Rossy lil najem al-muta3alliq bi-tadafoq al-plasma.
mt: We will use the occasion and the opportunity to renumber Rossy's plasma donor number.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: kullama kana raqam Rossby asghar kana al-najem aqal nashatan fi ma yata3allaq bil-in3ikasat al-maghnatisiyya.
mt: When the Rossby number is smaller, the flow is more likely to be affected by magnetic reconnection.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Wajaha Lwasaki al-3adid mina al-mashakel khilala ri7latihi.
mt: He added that the problems were not uncommon.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Saraqahu alqarasina, wa hajamahu kalb mas3ur fi al Tibet, wa haraba min alzawaj fi Nepal wa 2u3tuqila fi alhind.
mt: 1. He was kidnapped by the Taliban, 2. He was eaten by a famous dog in Tibet, 3. He ran away from his wife in Nepal, 4. He was killed in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Ya3mal mi3yar 802.11n 3ala kulen min taraddudat 2.4 Gega hetrz wa 5.0 Gega hetrz.
mt: 802.11n uses both the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Wa sayasma7u lahu dhalika bi-an yakuna mutwafiqan ma3a kullen min 802.11a wa 802.11b wa 802.11g bi-sharit an ta7tawi al-ma7atta al-asasiyya 3ala ajhizat radio muzdawija.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g are all compatible with the basic rate of 11 Mbps.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Tu3atabru sur3at 802.11n asra3 bikathir min sabiqatiha ma3 aqsa sur3aten nazariyaten tasilu ila 600 magabit bil thaniya.
mt: 802.11n is expected to surpass its predecessors in both theoretical and practical throughput to 600 megabits per second.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: lam yatruk Duvall, al-mutazawij wal 2ab li waladayn rashidayn, intiba3an muhimman lada Miller, al-lati tartabitu biha qisatuhu.
mt: Duvall, the mother of two teenage daughters, was not immediately available for comment, but Miller, who has been writing about her life for years, said she was happy to have the story told.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Wa 3indama tuliba min Miller al-ta3liq radda qa2ilan:"Mike ta7adatha kathiran khilala jalasat al-istima3… kuntu asta3id lidha lam asma3 ma kana yaqul".
mt: And when Miller was asked to elaborate, he replied: "Mike was very close to the table where the meeting was taking place… I think he didn't hear what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: Wa qala Hu innahu yas3a li khafed inbi3athat thani oksid al-karbon li kul wi7da min annatej al-ma7ali al-ijmali bi-hamesh mal7ouz bi-7ulul 3am 2020 3an mustawa 3am 2005.
mt: He said the second carbon dioxide emission target for each industrial country should be 25 percent below 2020 levels from the 2005 baseline.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Wa lam yu7addid raqman littakhfidhat qa2ilan innaha satatimu 3ala asas al-natij al-iqtisadi li99in.
mt: And no one has yet identified a culprit, as the investigation is still ongoing.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Wa shajja3a Hu adduwal annamiya 3ala “tajannub al-masar al-qadim lil-talwith awalan thumma al-tandhif la7iqan”.
mt: And the government has said that the "first step is to remove the old equipment before the cleaning process".
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Wa adafa annahu ma3a dhalika, la yanbaghi an yutlab minhum ta7ammul iltizamat tatajawaz mar7alat al-tatwir wal mas2uliyya wal qudurat.
mt: And it is also noted that it is not appropriate to take their responsibilities into account the requirements of the development, management and quality.
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Qaddamat majmu3at dirasat al-3iraq taqriraha fil sa3a 12:00 bi-tawqid Greenwhich al-yawm.
mt: 12:00 pm local time today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Wa tu7adhir al-majmu3a min anna La a7ad yastati3 an yadman an ay masar 3amal fil 3iraq fi hadhihi al-mar7ala qad yuqif al-7ared al-ahliyya, aw al-3unuf al-mutasa3ed, aw al-inzilaq na7wa al-fawda.
mt: The group warns that no one should be allowed to carry out any action in Iraq during this period that would threaten the lives of civilians, or the security forces, or the withdrawal of the chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Yabda2 al-taqrir bi-da3wa li ijra2 niqash maftou7 wa tashkil mawqif jama3i fi al-wilayat al-muta7ida 7awla assiyasa tijaha al-sharq al-awsat.
mt: The report begins with a call for a public debate and the formation of a joint position in the countries involved in the Middle East policy.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Yantaqid at-tqrir biquwwa kul janib taqriban min jawanib as-siyasa al-7aliyya lissul6a at-tanfithiyya fi at-ta3amul ma3 al-3iraq kma ya7uth 3ala i7dath ta'3yir fawry fi tawajjuhiha.
mt: The report strongly criticizes the government's policy of appeasement towards Iraq, as it leads to a further deterioration in the situation.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Wa min bayni tawsiyatiha al-baligh 3adaduhu 78 tawsiya, yanbaghi intikhadh mubadara diblumasiyya jadida qabla nihayat al-3am li ta2min 7udud al-3iraq doda al-tadakhulat al-3ida2iyya wa i3adat al-3alaqat al-diblomassiya ma3 al-buldan al-mujawira.
mt: 78 of its recommendations, it is recommended to choose a new diplomatic leader before the end of the year to ensure the Iraqi government's ability to control the entry of foreign goods and the establishment of diplomatic relations with warring countries.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: A3lanat 3uduw majles al-shuyukh wa sayida al-oula al-arjuntiniyya Kristina Fernandez de Kirchner tarashu7uha lil ri2asa masa2 ames fi madinat La Plata, al-lati taqa3 3ala bu3ud 50 kilometran (31 milan) min al-3asima  Buenos Aires.
mt: Pope Benedict XVI and Argentine President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner met in the city of La Plata, which is about 50 kilometres (31 miles) from the capital Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Wa a3lanat al-sayida Krichner 3azmaha al-tarashu7 lil-ri2asa fil al-masra7 al-arjentini wa huwa nafes al-makan al-ladhi kanat tabda2 fihi 7amlatiha al-intikhabiyya 3am 2005 li majles al-shuyukh bi-sifatiha 3udwan fi wafed  mu7afazat Buenos Aires.
mt: The Argentinean president Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner was rushed to the hospital in a critical condition after suffering a head injury during a campaign rally in Buenos Aires.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: I7tadam al-jadal natijatan lil2i5tilaf 7awl al-infaq 3ala al-i'3atha wa i3adat al-i3mar fi a38ab 7uduth i39ar Katrina. ith a6laqa 3alayha ba3'9 al-m7afzin al-malyin bi6ari8a sa5ira ism "9fqat bush fi Nyw Awrlyanz."
mt: 9fqat bush fi Nyw Awrlyanz.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Rakkaza al-naqed al-librali li juhud i3adat al-i3mar 3ala mane7 3uqud i3adet al-i3mqr ila al-muttali3in 3ala bawaten al-umur fi Washington.
mt: The liberal media is attacking the president's efforts to protect the unborn to the pro-choice crowd in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Dhahaba akthar min arba3at malayin shakhes ila Roma li 7udur al-janaza.
mt: 400 people have gone to Rome for the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Kana 3adad al-7adirin kabiran li darajat annahu lam yakun minal mumkin lil jami3 al-wusul ila al-janaza fi sa7at al-qiddis Butros.
mt: The number of people who could attend the funeral was large, as it was not possible for the church to accommodate all those who wanted to attend.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Tamma tarkib 3iddat shashat telefizyon kabira fi amakin mukhtalifa fi Roma lil sama7 lil jumhur bi-mushahadat al-3aza2.
mt: 6 large television screens in various locations in Rome were turned off for the public to see the damage.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: La8ad 2ujriyat i3dadat mumathila fi al-3did min al-mudun al-u5ra fi 2i6alya wafi baqiyyat al-3alam la siyyama fi bulanda wallati shahadaha 3adad kabir min al-nas.
mt: 2ujriyat i3dadat mumathila fi al-3did min al-mudun al-u5ra fi 2i6alya wafi baqiyyat al-3alam la siyyama fi bulanda wallati shahadaha 3adad kabir min al-nas.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Intaqada al-mu2arikhun siyasat maktab al-ta7qiqat al-fidraliyya al-sabiqa li tarkiz al-mawared 3ala al-qadata al-lati yashal 7alluha, wa khasatan 7alat al-sayarat al-masruqa bi-hadaf ta3ziz mu3addal naja7 al-wikala.
mt: The former federal government policy of prioritizing the most urgent cases was criticized, especially the ambulance that was delayed in its target of improving emergency response.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Bada2 al-kongres fi tamwil al-mubadara mukafa7at al-fasad  fi al-sana al-maliyya 3am 2005, wa 7adada anna maktab al-ta7qiqat al-fidrali yajeb an yukhases 10 wukala2 lil mawad al-iba7iyya lil balighin.
mt: The conference on investment in the company was marred by allegations of fraud in the fiscal year 2005, and the Federal Trade Commission is considering filing 10 lawsuits against the company for deceptive marketing practices.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Wa 7aqqaqa Robin Uthanna a3la natija fi al-adwar mu7rizan 70 ramya fi 41 kora faqat min khilal 4 darbat b 11 noqta wa darbatayn bi-6 noqat.
mt: 70-year-old Robin Uthanna scored 41 points in four quarters, including 11 three-pointers and two six-pointers.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Qaddama la3ibu al-madreb min al-daraja al-mutawasita Sachin Tendulkar wa Rahul Dravid ada2an jayyidan wa aqamu 100 sharakat.
mt: Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid both scored centuries in quick succession and added 100 runs.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Wa lakin ba3da khasarat wikit al-kabtin, 7aqqaqat al-hind 36 nuq6a faqa6, wa khasirat 7 wikits li inha2 al-tasfiya.
mt: 36 people were killed and 36 others injured, and 7 Wikits were damaged in the blast.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Wasala arra2is al-amriki Jorj Bush al-ibin ila Sangafora saba7 yawm 16 November/tishrin al-thani, fi mustahal jawla tastaghriq 2usbu3an fi Asya.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore on Monday, November 16, for a two-week Asian tour.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Wa kana fi istiqbalihi na2eb ra2is al-wuzara2 al-sangafore Wong Kan Seng, wa naqasha qadaya al-irhab ma3 ra2is wuzara2 Sangafora Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: And in his speech, Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong addressed the issue of terrorism with Singaporean Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Ba3da 2usbu3 min al-khasa2ir fi intikhabat al-tajdid al-nusfi, akhbara Bush al-jumhur 3an tawasu3 al-tijara fi Asya.
mt: 2 weeks after the mid-term elections, Bush told the public that trade in Asia is improving.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Wafaqa ra2is al-wuzara2 Stifin Harbr 3ala irsal "qanun al-hwa2 al-nathif" lil7ukuma ila lajna min jami3 al-2a7zab lilmuraja3a qabl qira2atih al-thaniya ba3d ijtima3 yawm al-thulatha2
mt: Prime Minister Stefan Harb agreed to send the "anti-smoking law" to a committee of the entire parliament for a second reading before the third meeting on Monday.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Wa talaba Layton bi-ijra2 taghyirat 3ala mashru3 qanun 7imayat al-bi2a khilal al-ijtima3 ma3a ra2is al-wuzara2, mutaliban kadhalika bi-siyaghatin jadidatin kamila wa shamila”li mashru3 qanun al-7izb li 7imayat al-bi2a.
mt: Layton asked for changes to the proposed bill during a meeting with the Prime Minister, claiming that the bill would be a complete and comprehensive failure.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Wa mundhu dhalika al-waqit, tadakhalat al-7ukuma al-fidraliyya li tawalli tamwil mustashfa Mersey fi Devonport, Tasmania. Wa qad ntaqadat 7ukumat al-wilaya wa ba3d al-nuwwab al-fidraliyyin hadha al-3amal bi-i3tibarihi 7ila qabla ijra2 al-intikhabat al-fidraliyya al-lati sa-tuqam fi November/tishrin al-thani.
mt: Since then, the federal government has delayed funding for the Mersey Community Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania. The state government and federal MPs have criticized the move before the federal election, which is due in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Lakinna ra2is al-wuzara2 John Howard sarra7a anna hadha al-ijra2 kana faqat li 7imayat marafiq al-mustashfa min takhfid tasnifiha min qibal 7ukumat Tusmanya, min khilal mani7 45 malyon dolar usturali idafiya.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the action was only to protect the hospital from a possible terrorist attack from the government of East Timor, at a cost of about 45 million Australian dollars in compensation.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: bi-7asab al-nashra al-akhira, tushiru qira2at mustawa sate7 al-ba7er ila 7uduth tsunami. Wa qad tamma tasjil nashat tsunami mu2akkad bil qurub min Pago Pago wa Niue.
mt: In the latest bulletin, the tsunami warning is extended to the South Pacific. A tsunami watch is in effect for Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Lam yatim tasjil ay adrar aw isabat fi Tonga, lakina alkahraba2 2inqata3at mu2aqatan, mimma mana3a al-sulutat fi Tonga, 7asbama tamma tadawuluhu fili3lam.  min talaqqi tahdhir min tsunami sadir 3an Markaz al-ta7dhir min tsunami fi al-mu7it al-hadi2 (PTWC)ز
mt: There were no reports of damage or injuries in Tonga, but the tsunami warning was canceled after the first wave hit. The Pacific Tsunami Warning Center issued a tsunami warning for the region.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Tamma ighlaq 14 madrasa fi Haway taqa3 3ala al-sawa7il aw bi al-qurb minha tawal yawm al-arbi3a2 3ala ar-raghm min raf3 al-ta7thirat.
mt: 14 schools were closed in Haway due to the proximity of the fire or the smoke from it on Thursday.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Wa ra77aba arra2is Bush al-ibin bil i3lan.
mt: And reporter Bush Jr. announced the news.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Wa wasafa al-muta7adith bi-ism Bush, Gordon Johndroe, ta3ahud kuriya al-shamaliyya bi anahu "khutwa ra2isiyya na7wa hadaf ta7qiq naze3 al-sila7 al-nawawi fi shibih al-jazira al-kuriyya bi shakl yumkin al-ta7aquq minhu.
mt: Bush's spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the president's "briefing" was "a review of the current situation in North Korea, including the potential for a nuclear test that could be conducted from it."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Tashakalat al-3asifa al-3ashira li- mawsim al-e3sar al-atlasi, wal musammat al-3asifa shibih al-istiwa2iyya Jerry, fi al-mu7it al-atlasi al-yawm.
mt: 11th hurricane of the Atlantic season, named Jerry, is in the Atlantic today.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Yadhkur NHC anna fi hadhihi al-noqta la yushakkil Jerry ay tahdid 3ala al-ared.
mt: The NHC notes that in this point, Jerry is not expected to make landfall.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Yuqadder Faylaq al-Quwwat al-Barriyat al-Handasiy al-Amrikiy anna 6 busat min al-matar qad takhtariq al-sudud al-mutadarira sabiqan.
mt: 6 U.S. military buses have been destroyed in a previous attack.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Yaqa3 al-jana7 al-tasi3 7aliyyan, wal-ladhi shahida fayadanat yasilu irtifa3uha ila 20 qadaman khilal i3sar Katrina, fi miyah yatajawazu irtifa3uha al-sad al-qarib.
mt: 7aliyyan, who witnessed Katrina's rise to 20 feet, is now 7 years old.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Yansakibu al-ma2 min a3la al-sad bo-3ared 100 qadam.
mt: 100 feet above the ground.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: A3raba mubir majlis al-3umum al-sayed Adam Cuerden 3an i7batihi min 3amaliyyat al-7adhif fi 7adithin lahu ma4 Wikinews al-shaher al-madi.
mt: The United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon has been briefed on the progress of the project in the last two months.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Inna [Wales] kana kadhiban ma3ana mudhu al-bidaya.Fa qad tasarafa awalan kama law kana dhalika li asbab qanuniya. Thumma tadhahra bi-annahu yastami3 ilayna, wusulan ila 7adfhihi al-fanni".
mt: "Wales was lying to us from the beginning. He first claimed it was for legal reasons. Then he suddenly announced that he was coming to us, bringing his artistic credentials."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Adda inzi3aj al-mujatama3 min al-amr ila badhli al-juhud al-7aliyya li siyaghat siyasa bi-sha2in al-mu7tawa al-jinsi li mawqi3 al-web al-ladhi yastadifu malayin al-wasa2it al-murakhasa bi-shaklin 3alaniy.
mt: The community is urged to boycott the site for its sexist and discriminatory language towards women.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Kan al-3amal al-munjaz fi a'3labih nathariyyan walakin kutib al-barnamij limu7akat al-mula7athat al-muta3alliqa bimajarrat al-rami.
mt: The accident was not immediately clear, but the program was suspended after the crash.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Kan al-athr al-lathi bat yab7athu 3anh al-fariq najman 3an quwwat mad bayn al-madda al-mu3tima fi al-majrra wal-madda al-mu3tima fi majarrat darb at-tabbana.
mt: The train was traveling at a speed of 100 km/h between the two stations in the main line and the station in the branch line.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Tumaris majarrat darb al-tabbana 8uwwa 3ala majrrat al-qaws al-qazama kama hawa al-7al binnisba lil8uwwa al-lati yumarisuha al-qamar 3ala al-2ar'9 mma yatasabbab fi 7uduth al-mad wal-jazr.
mt: The moon's orbit is tilted 23 degrees relative to the Earth's orbit, which causes the moon to appear to rise and set in the west.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Tamakkana al-3ulama2 min al-wusul ila istintaj mafaduhu anna al-madda al-mudhlima tu2athiru 3ala madda mudhlima ukhra bi-nafs al-tariqa al-lati tu2athir biha al-madda al-3adiya.
mt: The scientists say that the new material can also affect other materials in the same way that the original material does.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Wa taqulu hadhihi al-nazariyya inna mu3dham al-madda al-mudhlima 7awla allmajarra tatamarkadhu 3ala shakli hala wa tatakawwanu min jusaymatin saghira.
mt: This theory says that the amount of matter that is converted to energy in a nuclear reaction is much smaller than the mass of the fuel.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Wa tudhhiru taqarir telefizyoniyya dukhanan abyad yatasa3ad min al-masna3.
mt: Television reports show a white cloud rising from the factory.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Wa 7adharat al-sultat al-ma7aliyya al-sukkan fi mu7it al-masna3 min al-baqa2 fi manadhilihim, wa an yutfi2u al-mukayifat wa 3adam al-shurub min as-sanbur.
mt: The local authority has advised residents to stay indoors, and to close windows and doors.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Wifqan lil wikala al-nawawiyya al-yabaniyya, tamma iktishaf al-sizyum wal yud fi al-masna3.
mt: The Japanese embassy has confirmed the discovery of plutonium and uranium at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Wa taftaridu al-sulutat anna al-musta3abat kanat ta7tawi 3ala wuqud al-uranyum fi al-mawqi3 wa lati mumkin an takun tasarabat wa nfajarat.
mt: Authorities say the fire was fueled by uranium stored at the site and may have exploded.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Iktashafa al-duktur Toni Moll marad al-sul shadid al-mu8awama lil adwiya (XDR-TB) fi minta8ati Kwazulu-Natal bi janub Ifri8iya.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered a severe drug-resistant strain of tuberculosis in the province of Kwazulu-Natal in South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Wa qala khilal i7da al-muqabalat, inna al-badil al-jadid yab3athu 3ala al-qalaq bi-sabab al-mu3adal al-murtafi3 li 7alat al-wafat.
mt: In the interview, the new device is said to be a breakthrough because of its ability to detect early death.
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Ya3taqidu al-doktor Moll bi-anna ba3d al-marda qad usibu bi-virus min al-mustashfa, wa kana ithnan 3ala al-aqal min 3ummal al-mustashfa ya7milunahu.
mt: Dr. Moll said that the virus had been found in some of the patients, and that two of the hospital's staff were infected.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
